name: Tweetdeck - Hide / Disable Scrollbars
description: This script properly disables scrollbars in Tweetdeck. You can still scroll using any other means (mouse wheel, arrows, PgUp / PgDn etc.) as well as go to top by clicking on the column header
additional_info:
There are other scripts that do the same thing, but this one does it the right way as opposed to wonky workarounds.
Scrollbars are disabled with "overflow-y:hidden":
in .js-column-scroller to disable the main column scrollbars;
in .js-detail-container to prevent the scrollbars appearing when viewing tweet details
